description: MIR155 (MicroRNA 155) is an RNA Gene, and is affiliated with the miRNA class. Diseases associated with MIR155 include Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma and Pancreatic Ductal Adenocarcinoma. Among its related pathways are Toll-like receptor signaling pathway and Cell differentiation - expanded index.
